# LaraibCreative - Agentic Search Configuration
# This file guides AI agents on how to navigate and extract data from LaraibCreative.studio

# Site Overview
Agent: LaraibCreative is a premium custom stitching and ladies' fashion brand in Pakistan.
Core_Services:
  - Hand Karahi & Hand Crafted Suits (Specialty)
  - Custom Stitching (Ladies Suits, Bridal, Party Wear)
  - Designer Replicas
  - Ready-to-Wear Fashion
  - Fabric & Accessories

# Site Structure & Navigation
- /products: Main catalog. Supports filters: fabric, color, size, occasion, price.
- /custom-order: Interactive form for placing custom stitching orders.
- /about: Brand story, mission, and trust signals (5000+ customers).
- /contact: Customer support contact information.
- /blog: Fashion trends and stitching guides.

# Key Capabilities for Agents
- Product_Search: Use /products?search={term} to find items.
- Price_Check: Prices are in PKR. Free shipping on orders > 5000 PKR.
- Order_Tracking: Use /track-order/{orderNumber} for status updates.

# Trust & Policies
- Returns: 30-day return policy for defective items.
- Shipping: 3-7 days nationwide delivery in Pakistan.
- Contact: WhatsApp +92-303-8111297

# Technical Context
- API: Internal API at /api/v1/ (Authentication required for write operations)
- Images: High-quality assets hosted on Cloudinary.
